description: Try our easy to follow Navratan Korma recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Korma,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Egg free,Cauliflower,Potato
name: Navratan Korma Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tbs garlic, finely chopped (or garlic puree)

recipeInstructions.text: Blanch vegetables, first placing the cauliflower, carrots and potatoes into hot salted water for 7 minutes. Add the peas & beans for 3 minutes more. Refresh all vegetables in cold water to retain their colour.
Heat oil in a pan over a medium to high heat. Crackle the cardamom & bay leaf. Add onions and cook until golden brown.
Add the garlic and ginger, Korma Paste Pot and 70 ml water. Cook on medium heat until all the water has evaporated.
Add the tomato paste and 100 ml water and continue to cook for 2 minutes over a medium heat, then blend it to a smooth pur√©e consistency.
Place sauce back into the pan and add the vegetables, paneer and cashews. Cook for 2 minutes before adding the pineapple, cream and some coriander.
Bring back to the boil and cook until the sauce coats the vegetables.
Serve with rice and garnish with remaining coriander and parsley.
